Name: Devil Girl
About the game: When you gaze at the abyss, the abyss also gazes at you. ◆Featured Systems ◇Full CG mode can be turned on in the environment setting, and HCG can be freely browsed. ◇Pressure-Free Operation Support one-click mouse operation-Fast text-to-text system ◆Story “Hey, wake up, how long are you going to sleep?' A young girl with blond hair and red pupils was sitting on a chair, looking at me proudly, rubbing her eyes. The girl said she was an angel sent from heaven to save my lonely soul. She told me that I could do whatever I wish to her from now on. 'Whether it's a sex thing or anything ..... is fine!' I had been single for 30 years and had never even touched a girl's hand, but it all came so suddenly ..... How was I going to get along with this girl? The world became increasingly strange and bizarre since this girl appeared. What on earth was going on in the world? ◆Play Method The main play method is to live with the beautiful girl 'Nethia', who can do whatever you want. You can also take Nethia on trips to various places to enjoy the feeling of love, increase emotions, and unlock various sweet events. The game has a large number of costumes and a variety of fun props. You can unlock all kinds of H-positions, and you can also let the girls wear all kinds of H-clothes to match H. You can even play SM with a rope and even bondage H. But in a life that looks like paradise, there are irrational and bizarre things everywhere. If you persist in your quest, inexplicable fears, and strange events will come one after another. Would you rather sink into a dream, or overcome all your fears and discover the truth of the world? ◆Game Features ◇41 basic CGs, including more than 200 differences. ◇The heroin can change 8 different sets of clothes ◇Game text 80,000 words. ◇Love building, + Cthulhu weird style game. ◇Contains two completely voiced female characters throughout the entirety of the game. ◇Game endings: 7 kinds telegram :
